title: How can I get to level 6 here?
body: How can I get to level 6 here? is it different with the game level since i have already been level 30 in game.

replies.body: Your boards and Summoner level are tied to each other, but sometimes the boards side needs a little push before it updates correctly. Since posting here, I can now see you as a full grown level 30 ^_^
